title: Monty Mole

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Excavate**: Dig under someone, you will hear all their whispers until you use this on another target.
- **Main Tunnel** (2x): Dig under Bowser's castle for this night, Learning the roles of Koopa visitors in addition to your Attribute.
- **Dust and Rubble** (1x): Throw up enough sand to start a sandstorm, Good Investigative roles will recieve no feedback tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, Learn the names of everyone who visits a Koopa member.
- You may multitask **Excavate** with another ability.

desc:
Post 1417
*Monty Moles are rock-throwing moles, big time mischief-makers.*
